song.title: Project Stardust
song.info:
written by Sonic^Destiny vocals by Mariska
2x you set me free together we stand strong right next to me where you belong
you are my dream you light my day you are my sunshine but you're far away
you ride the skies ride the stars pure as ice is what you are
love makes you blind you cannot see what's there to find inside of me
there's no escape our love is strong just you and me no right or wrong
bright as the sun you light my way I cannot think of a better day
the birds are free the sky is blue life is a dream and so are you
2x you set me free together we stand strong right next to me where you belong
you are my dream you light my day you are my sunshine but you're far away
you ride the skies ride the stars prue as ice is what you are
